mapper.update: update checklist_instances set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, onboarding_id = #{onboardingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stage = #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, progress_percent = #{progressPercent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where checklist_id = #{checklistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select checklist_id, company_id, onboarding_id, name, stage, status, progress_percent, created_at, updated_at from checklist_instances where checklist_id = #{checklistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select checklist_id, company_id, onboarding_id, name, stage, status, progress_percent, created_at, updated_at from checklist_instances
